message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, my budget is limited and I would like to propose a lower price of $750000. I believe this is a fair compromise and I am hopeful we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that this product will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $825000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to me.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $800000 for the product. This aligns closely with my budget while still reflecting its value. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.

I'm close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $815000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's worth to me. I hope you can understand my position.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial solution. In light of our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final offer of $810000 for the product. I believe this reflects a fair compromise between our respective positions.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $812000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's worth to me. I hope you can understand my position.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final offer of $811000 for the product. I believe this reflects a fair compromise between our respective positions.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $813000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's worth to me. I hope you can understand my position.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a compromise. Based on our discussions, I would like to propose a final offer of $812500 for the product. I believe this reflects a fair compromise between our respective positions.
